comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Fixed in svn revision 154258

jcr:path LIKE '/foo/%' now selects descendants of /foo

description:
A query like: 

SELECT * FROM nt:base WHERE jcr:path LIKE '/foo/%'

only selects the children of /foo instead off all descendants of /foo.
summary: SQL query with jcr:path LIKE '/foo/%' only selects children
